tweet.text: Are you a current or recent grad student studying the history of U.S. in the World? Apply to the Presidential Management Fellows Program for a chance to work with @HistoryAtState on the #FRUS series! #PMF applications accepted from Sept. 28 to Oct. 12 https://t.co/9MdLicfclR https://t.co/JMpW8FuoKY
